name: FRigUnit_SphericalPoseReader
doc: * Outputs a float value between 0-1 based off of the driver item's rotation in a specified region.

OutputParam: The normalized output parameter; ranges from 0 (when outside yellow region) to 1 (in the green region) and smoothly blends from 0-1 in the yellow region.
DriverItem: The bone that will drive the output parameter when rotated into the active regions of this pose reader.
DriverAxis: The axis of the driver transform that is compared against the falloff regions. Typically the axis that is pointing at the child; usually X by convention. Default is X-axis (1,0,0).
RotationOffset: Rotate the entire falloff region to align with the desired area of effect.
ActiveRegionSize: The size of the active region (green) that outputs the full value (1.0). Range is 0-1. Default is 0.1.
ActiveRegionScaleFactors: The directional scaling parameters for the active region (green).
FalloffSize: The size of the falloff region (yellow) that defines the start of the output range. A value of 1 wraps the entire sphere with falloff. Range is 0-1. Default is 0.2.
FalloffRegionScaleFactors: The directional scaling parameters for the falloff region (yellow).
FlipWidthScaling: Flip the positive / negative directions of the width scale factors.
FlipHeightScaling: Flip the positive / negative directions of the height scale factors.
OptionalParentItem: An optional parent to use as a stable frame of reference for the active regions (defaults to DriverItem's parent if unset).
ExecuteContext: * This property is used to chain multiple mutable units together
